Commissioner: We know that many providers are nervous about their own health and the health of their kids, so making sure that there is enough flexibility for everyone to accommodate their own community is really important.

Commissioner: Case by case. We're working to ensure providers have a plan: who is responsible for that child, who's been in contact w/ them. These answers will determine the next steps.

Commissioner: "This pandemic has highlighted the vulnerabilities of the child care industry that have existed long before #COVID19 and are exacerbated by the realities of trying to grapple with public health and child development in this moment."
